text: â€œNdithu okhulupirira (owona) ndiamene akhulupirira mwa Allah ndi Mtumiki Wake; ndipo akakhala naye pa chinthu chokhudza onse, sachoka mpaka atampempha (Mtumiki) chilolezo. Ndithu amene akukupempha chilolezo, iwowo ndi amene akukhulupirira Allah ndi Mtumiki Wake. Choncho akakupempha chilolezo chifukwa cha zinthu zawo zina, muloleze mwa iwo amene wamfuna (ngati utaona kuti chidandaulo chake nchoona), ndipo uwapemphere chikhululuko kwa Allah; ndithu Allah Ngokhululuka kwabasi; Ngwachisoni chosatha
